short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to get someone's email from their GitHub profile

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this extension, you can find someone's email address when you open their GitHub profile. Navigate to this person's GitHub page and click on the extension in your toolbar.
